QuestData.Title: Faerie Dragon Muisek
QuestData.Description: $n, next I must have you capture a creature that in appearance, may look quite fragile, yet its powerful spirit is what we are truly after. The faerie dragons that I speak of have served the night elves as their allies. We must capture one so that the horde may benefit from this strength of spirit as well.$B$BHere is the muisek, $n. Kill 8 sprite darters or sprite dragons, and capture their muisek. They may be found to the west of here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Sprite Darters or Sprite Dragons. Use the Muisek Vessel to shrink and capture the fallen Faerie Dragons.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to capture the muisek of the faerie dragons?
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. Now the spiritual powers of the faerie dragon will be available to us.$B$BI hope you willing to perform another task for me.
